svcproc.title: U/UE, RT/RTE, RT2/RTE2
svcproc.para: The only parts of Hendrickson suspension systems which require lubrication are the bronze center and end bushings, and the bronze, ball-indented bushings in the spring eyes that ride on hardened steel pins which have lubrication channels. All other Hendrickson parts are rubber-bushed, and do not require lubrication.

When lubricating the bushings and spring pins, jack up the rear of the truck chassis to relieve the load on these parts, and to make the lube flow properly. Lubricate until the lube comes out both ends of the pin lubrication channels. If the lube does not flow properly, clean out the pin channel.

caution.para: Do not use heat to facilitate lubrication. System parts are heat-treated, and may be damaged by excessive heat during service procedures.
